item.title: Have $15,000 in credit card debt? Here's what a debt forgiveness plan could cover.
item.description: If you're dealing with $15,000 in credit card debt, this type of debt relief could offer a reprieve. Here's how.

item.title: 2024 election updates: Trump courts Latino voters, Harris off the trail
item.description: Most polls show Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump neck-and-neck in key states with just about two weeks to go.

item.title: TreeHouse frozen waffle recall expanded to include pancakes
